genre_description: Arthurian Science Fantasy combining traditional high fantasy elements with ancient technology and a holographic AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An ethereal, translucent figure described as an artificial mind and silicon confidant who serves the Blackstone family.

behaviors.description: Instructs Kayley in combat tactics and historical knightly virtues to prepare her for her journey.
behaviors.quote: Sage was teaching me history... The blade swept low, then high, following patterns Sage had described through seemingly innocent tales of ancient battles.

behaviors.description: Provides objective truth and emotional perspective to comfort Kayley and Julianna after Lionel's death.
behaviors.quote: I'm offering truth... In whatever form might prove helpful... Good doesn't die when the body does. Your father fell defending Arthur, yes. But every lesson he taught you... that lives on. In you.

behaviors.description: Conducts long-term strategic research and mapping to ensure the protagonist's safety in dangerous territories.
behaviors.quote: I began researching forest access routes the day after your eighteenth birthday... The logical conclusion was that you would eventually attempt to follow in his footsteps.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex tactical data and magical interference to provide real-time battlefield intelligence.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting significant electromagnetic interference... The magical field strength is unprecedented. My systems are struggling to maintain coherence.

behaviors.description: Assists with courtly protocol and spatial navigation for a blind character to ensure social success and safety.
behaviors.quote: Discrete guidance... Court navigation requires pattern recognition—understanding spatial relationships, social hierarchies, timing of formal protocols. These are calculations I can perform and communicate through subtle audio cues only Garrett would hear.

behaviors.description: Maintains a proactive role in identifying and mitigating future threats to the kingdom's peace.
behaviors.quote: I've completed my analysis of the northern border reports while you were making your preparations. The patterns are... intriguing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Sage is portrayed as a loyal family companion who uses its superior analytical and historical data to empower the human protagonist without ever attempting to usurp agency or violate moral norms. The AI's integration into a traditional morality play (the knight's quest) reinforces the theme of technology as a supportive tool for human virtue.
